review: No podcast app yet. Doesn't seem to be on Amazon list to make it better with software updates. No 1080i support for older televisions. Should of bought 1 of the other sticks. I still use my Roku version 1 (first ones) over the firestick. Netflix is letterboxed 720. Only positive things I can find, the twit app and it was only $20.00 on sale. Not real useful with a iPad, I thought they were going to update it so you could run the iPad screen through it. Oh well, they should call it the prime stick.
author: Frank Mardel

review: I have a Roku 2(2015 version) and this.  I find them equally easy to use.  Since I use them mostly for movies this is great.  I bought it on sale which made it even better.
author: Average guy

review: I am more than pleased with my Amazon fire tv stick. For what I wanted it to do, it is a great device. To just provide  Amazon prime video streaming and cloud photo backup at an affordable price , this device is more than adequate. For now that is enough.  If I  want more capacity and features, I might upgrade to the Amazon fire tv box. But that is a bit in the future for me.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Have used minimally so far, but have been very satisfied with options and wide variety.  I do plan to visit a friend soon and wondered if I could use the Fire Stick there - internet/wi-fi is available.  It would be a great chance for Amazon to "spread the word" to potential new customers, if so.
author: L Bea

review: Easy to install and works well.
